name: @clalarco/vue3-plotly
description: Vue 3 component for plotly.js. Forked from <https://github.com/VanOord/vue3-plotly>
author: Claudio Alarcon <https://github.com/clalarco>

scripts.lib:publish: npm run lib:build && npm publish --workspace lib
scripts.demo:publish: npm run demo:build && npm publish --workspace demo
scripts.docs:build: rm -rf dist/gh-pages && vitepress build docs && npm run demo:build
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lib:publish && npm run docs:publish
